ModMetaData.name: RimTalk TTS Addon
ModMetaData.author: Nitori_Tachyon
ModMetaData.description:
Text-to-Speech extension for RimTalk that brings your colonists' voices to life!
[url=https://github.com/whatismyname0/RimTalkTTSModule]Github[/url]
This mod captures dialogue generated by RimTalk and converts it to speech using Fish Audio API. Features include:
[h2]Feature[/h2]
[list] [*]Real-time speech synthesis for all RimTalk dialogues [*]Per-pawn voice model configuration [*]Translation support for multilingual speech [*]Automatic dialogue blocking until speech is ready [*]Synchronized cancellation when RimTalk ignores dialogue [*]Configurable voice parameters (temperature, top_p) [*]Volume control [/list]
[h2] Requirements[/h2]
[list] [*]RimTalk must be installed and enabled [*]Python 3.9+ with fish-audio-sdk package installed [*][url=https://fish.audio/]Fish Audio[/url] API key(may support other tts supplier or local tts model in future) [*]Voice reference ID (can be found on fish audio website by clicking "share" button of the voice model you want to add, then delete "https://fish.audio/m/") for speech generation [*]It is recommended to disable "Allow Simultaneous Conversations" setting in Rimtalk [/list]
[h2]Setup[/h2]
[olist] [*]Enable both RimTalk and RimTalk TTS mods [*]Get your Fish Audio API key [*]Configure TTS settings in mod options [*]Assign voice models to your colonists [/olist]
[h2]ATTENTION[/h2]: When using Alt+F4 to close the game, RimTalk TTS may not shutdown the server. This mod operates non-invasively through Harmony patches and does not modify RimTalk's core code.
